price: (Ey Muhammed!) İman etmiyorlar diye adeta kendini helâk edeceksin!
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
